name: 蒼葉
message: "Is that all you've got?"
...What?

name: 蒼葉
message: "If you've got it, use it. Right?"
That's...<K> my voice?

name: 蒼葉
message: "I mean, it's not like I broke the rules. I just... see it. I dunno why."
That's...<K> me.
A bunch of guys about my age are gathered around, fighting, drinking, doing drugs, fooling around with women...
Some are sleeping... and some are playing Rhyme.
I'm arm and arm with my friends, walking toward some Rhymers.
I'm watching myself, as if watching a stranger.
But from time to time, a sort of static disrupts the scene.
It's like being trapped in a 3D movie, uncanny, unfamiliar.
...Wait, unfamiliar?
No, that's not right.
I know this place. I've been here before. More than once.
This is...<K> my past.
My wild years... The memories I've forgotten.
But why now?

name: 蒼葉
message: "What a joke! I can see right through you!"
And then, I remember.
In Rhyme, I could see my opponents' weaknesses, and that made me invincible.

name: 蒼葉
message: "This is boring as fuck! I'm gonna finish you right now!"
I never wondered why or how I could see those things.

Use whatever you can to your advantage.
That's how I thought back then.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Haha, hahahaha! Ahahahahaha! Peace, bitch!"

name: 対戦者
message: "Uwaahhhhh!"
Stop!!!
...Please stop...

name: ウイルス
message: "He took a direct hit to the brain."

name: トリップ
message: "Worst case, he'll be stuck like that for the rest of his sorry life. He might never wake up."

name: ウイルス
message: "The guy who did it is called Sly Blue... He's a wild one."

No...
I don't want to remember.
That's...
That's not...

name: 蒼葉
message: "No... I didn't mean to... I never thought..."
I didn't know.
I didn't know that the "weaknesses" I was seeing were in fact the most vulnerable parts of my opponents' minds.
I was ignorant, but I reveled in the feeling of superiority. I never questioned that having the power meant I could use it however I liked.
I...<K> broke people.
I broke their minds.
Their minds!

name: 蒼葉
message: "AAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!"
